summary: Reduces the number of NPCs added by Lively Inns And Taverns by Demidekidasu
descriptionHtml:
Some time ago I gave this file out to a few people who were asking for a less crowded version in Lively Inns And Taverns' comments section. I looked in on the mod recently and saw that people were still asking for a reduced version so here it is for the rest of you!

This mod removes many of the NPC spawns and redistributes the remaining ones so you don't walk straight into someone as soon as you walk through the door. It also adds a little more movement as the NPCs don't spawn and immediately sit down.


Note: The number of NPCs has been adjusted by the size of the tavern with the largest having 10/11 NPCs spawned and the smallest 2/3. Usually the amount was at least halved compared to the standard mod. There are a couple of taverns that weren't included in the original mod, if there's enough clamouring for it I'll add them myself at some point but I've not seen it mentioned by anyone else yet :P


Install: Just add my .esp to your Skyrim/Data folder, [color=#ff0000][b]deactivate the original LIAT - NPCs.esp[/b] [/color]and activate LIAT - Less NPCs *NOTE THIS REQUIRES THE ORIGINAL MOD TO WORK*

Get it here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19841/?][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19841/?[/b][/url]

For anyone experiencing grey faces after installing this .esp you can either rename the facegen folder found here:

Textures\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\

from LIAT - NPCs.esp to LIAT - Less NPCs.esp

OR

Rename LIAT - Less NPCs.esp to LIAT - NPCs.esp (seems people have had more success with this method).



If you think anywhere is still too busy or too empty PM me and I'll have a go at balancing it a bit better.



This mod was cleaned in TES5Edit because you should clean your dang mods people!
author: moom1881
